title: Airbus joins Starlab commercial space station project
summary: Airbus Defence and Space is joining a commercial space station project led by Voyager Space, a move that could potentially make it easier for European governments to use the station after the retirement of the International Space Station.

title: Raytheon selects Lockheed Martin bus for U.S. Space Force missile-tracking satellite
summary: Raytheon Intelligence & Space announced Jan. 4 it selected a Lockheed Martin bus to build a missile-tracking satellite for the U.S. Space Force.

title: So long, Richard Shelby, and thanks for all the pork
summary: As Richard Shelby steps down, will Washington replace Alabama in prominence?

title: Bootcamp to help space startups clear regulatory hurdles
summary: The first bootcamp aimed at helping startups navigate the space sector’s complex regulatory landscape is coming to New Mexico.

title: China is expanding its Wenchang spaceport to host commercial and crewed moon launches
summary: China is aiming to expand the use of its coastal Wenchang spaceport to both allow a greater overall launch rate and establish new facilities needed for crewed lunar missions.
